      • calculateBMI

        public double calculateBMI​(double weight,
                           double height)
        Returns the BMI given a weight in kilograms and a height in meters.
        Parameters:
        weight - the weight in kilograms
        height - the length in kilograms
        Returns:
        bmi the body mass index
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when illegal (zero or below) values are provided for weight and/or length

      • getMessage

        public java.lang.String getMessage​(double bmi)
        Will return an appropriate String representation belonging to a given BMI. BMI index Categorie <18.5 Ondergewicht 18.5 - 25.0 Gezond gewicht 25.0 - 30.0 Overgewicht 30.0 - 40.0 Obesitas >40 Morbide Obesitas
        Parameters:
        bmi - the BMI
        Returns:
        message
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when illegal (zero or below) BMI value is provided
